EmailTemplate.name: 2024 - Introducing JenMoore
EmailTemplate.subject: Introducing Your New Contact For {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi! We're excited to introduce Jen Moore as your new dedicated point of contact for all your mobile modular office needs. Jen's expertise will ensure you receive exceptional communication, service, and support in fulfillment of your modular space needs.
Visit our website to explore our complete selection of mobile offices: --> View mobile offices https://www.boxxmodular.com/offices/mobile/
Jen is looking forward to connecting with you! For your convenience, here is her contact information:
Jen Moore jamoore@boxxmodular.com (984) 365-1011
If you need more space now, or are considering modular solutions for the future, reach out to discuss some options.
We are here to help!
